Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: hogan \hogan\ n. An earth-covered Navajo lodge; it is traditionally built with the entrance facing east. [WordNet 1.5]

Hogan n 1: United States golfer who won many major golf tournaments (born in 1912) [syn: {Ben Hogan}, {William Benjamin Hogan}] 2: a Navajo lodge covered with earth; traditionally built with the entrance facing east
